subject: Order #SSN3634
description_text:
Good Afternoon,

On 11/19/2025 I have placed an order but I haven't received any updates yet regarding the status of the order. Do you have any estimates or information about my order and when it will be shipped/delivered. The order number is #SSN3634, on address Koekoeksbloem 27, 8255KH, Swifterbant.

Kind regards,

Jesper van Gennip

conversations.body_text: Hi Jesper van Gennip,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking information.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326634560DE
